column10: [mission] Find a canton with a High level of risk and follow recommendations for indoors

column13: The text of the first recommendation was a little bit repetitive. I liked the icons that you created. The colors could be chosen more appropriately so that also color blind people can see a difference (red/green).

It took me sometime to understand the task - I was able to select the cantons with risk level but then to click on - ' you are inside/outside' - it took me sometime to understand that I need to click in that option.
It looks good and user friendly :)
maybe sometimes not complete sentences, but bullet point could be sufficient

I feel that the visual recommendation depicting the man running to find shelter could cause confusion due to the changing shade of red, considering that the danger rating itself is color based and uses tones of red.
According to my thought, Icon and text can be in different proportions. For instance, an icon can be bigger than text so that just in case the icon is not understandable, I can read text.
I feel like the icons in the mixed version could be 10 or 20% bigger
The click option can be made more user friendly
